summary: REQ-22 is largely implemented by adding the requested Google Search Console HTML verification file under frontend/public. However, the file content shown in the diff appears to include a trailing newline/blank line, which may violate the requirement that the response body be exactly the specified string. The diff also includes unrelated frontend changes (routing/UI/hooks/etc.) that were not requested for this task.

missing_requirements.requirement: The response body of `/google79d2180f87c8c2c7.html` is exactly `google-site-verification: google79d2180f87c8c2c7.html` (no extra characters).
missing_requirements.reason: The added static file content in the diff shows an extra trailing newline/blank line after the verification string, so the body may not be byte-for-byte identical to the required string.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified various frontend features unrelated to serving a single static Google verification HTML file (e.g., new /updates route, UI/layout changes, gameplay/auth hooks updates, Tailwind/theme updates).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scopes the change to adding the provided HTML file verification and lists broader SEO and other changes as non-goals; these additional frontend changes were not requested.
